actions.text: Reported to House from the Commitee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-960.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7700 to amend title 39, United States Code, to establish congressional review of postal rate decisions, to increase congressional oversight of the United States Postal Service, to abolish the board of Governors of the United States Postal service, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7700 (Postal rate and service reform).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7700 to amend title 39, United States Code, to establish congressional review of postal rate decisions, to increase congressional oversight of the United States Postal Service, to abolish the board of Governors of the United States Postal service, and for other purposes.
